description: This file defines a Vehicle class representing a fleet vehicle with properties such as id, name, type, license plate, status, last maintenance date, mileage, and optional notes. It includes methods for creating an instance from a map, converting an instance to a map for storage, and copying an instance with updated fields.

classes.name: Vehicle
classes.description: A data model representing a vehicle in a fleet management system, with methods for serialization and cloning.

methods.name: Vehicle.fromMap
methods.description: Creates a Vehicle instance from a map, typically retrieved from a database.

methods.name: Vehicle.toMap
methods.description: Converts a Vehicle instance into a map for database storage.

methods.name: Vehicle.copyWith
methods.description: Creates a copy of a Vehicle instance with optional updated fields.
